trans-unit.source: To successfully complete this section, you must have a working installation of Node.js and the Azure SDK for Node.js for your platform.
trans-unit.target: To successfully complete this section, you must have a working installation of Node.js and the Azure SDK for Node.js for your platform.

trans-unit.source: Install the Azure SDK for Node.js: <html></html>Windows installer<html></html> | <html></html>Mac installer<html></html> | <html></html>Linux download<html></html><html></html>
trans-unit.target: Install the Azure SDK for Node.js: <html></html>Windows installer<html></html> | <html></html>Mac installer<html></html> | <html></html>Linux download<html></html><html></html>

trans-unit.source: If you are using Mac or Linux, install Node.js from <html></html>http://nodejs.org<html></html>.
trans-unit.target: If you are using Mac or Linux, install Node.js from <html></html>http://nodejs.org<html></html>.

trans-unit.source: The Windows installer already includes Node.js.
trans-unit.target: The Windows installer already includes Node.js.
